thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 22 of 2268
thread.title: Katy

author: Katy
title: Katy
text:
After looking around at other blinds online and in shops Im so happy I chose Blinds to go.
There free samples are brilliant for checking colour and style, it meant I could match up the blinds to my kitchen units perfectly.
I found the measuring guides online really useful as I've never measured for blinds myself before and the fitting instructions were just as good.
My blinds got delivered as expected and I am over the moon with the end result.
They look great, fit perfectly and all for a really competitive price.
I still need binds in 2 more rooms and will definitely be oredering again.
